TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AesManaged extends System.Security.Cryptography.Aes
Public NotInheritable Class AesManaged Inherits Aes
public ref class AesManaged sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::Aes

summary.span: 提供高级加密标准 (AES) 对称算法的托管实现。

span.span: Provides a managed implementation of the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) symmetric algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks AES 算法本质上是 Rijndael 对称算法，具有固定的块大小和迭代计数。The AES algorithm is essentially the Rijndael symmetric algorithm with a fixed block size and iteration count. 此类的工作方式与 类相同，但将块限制为128位，不允许反馈模式。This class functions the same way as the class but limits blocks to 128 bits and does not allow feedback modes. > [!NOTE] > 如果启用了针对符合美国联邦信息处理标准（FIPS）的算法的 Windows 安全策略设置，则使用此算法将引发 。If the Windows security policy setting for Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS)-compliant algorithms is enabled, using this algorithm throws a . > [!NOTE] > Microsoft 确信，如果应用了可验证的填充，则在应用可验证的填充时，对加密的数据进行解密（默认值为 属性的默认值），而不先确保密码文本的完整性（特别具体的情况除外）。Microsoft believes that it's no longer safe to decrypt data encrypted with the Cipher-Block-Chaining (CBC) mode of symmetric encryption (which is the default value of the property) when verifiable padding has been applied without first ensuring the integrity of the ciphertext, except for very specific circumstances. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用填充的 CBC 模式对称解密中的计时漏洞](/dotnet/standard/security/vulnerabilities-cbc-mode)。For more information, see [Timing vulnerabilities with CBC-mode symmetric decryption using padding](/dotnet/standard/security/vulnerabilities-cbc-mode). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类对示例数据进行加密和解密。The following example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt sample data using the class. [!code-csharp[AesManaged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/aesmanaged/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AesManaged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/aesmanaged/vb/program.vb#1)] [!code-fsharp[AesManaged#1](~/samples/snippets/fsharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/aesmanaged/fs/program.fs#1)]

span.span: The block size, in bits, of the cryptographic operation.
The default is 128 bits.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 AES，唯一有效的块大小为128位。For AES, the only valid block size is 128 bits. 有关块大小的详细信息，请参阅 。See the for more information about block size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最大反馈大小为128位。The maximum feedback size is 128 bits. > [!NOTE] > 由于此算法不支持反馈模式，因此不建议使用此属性。Because this algorithm does not support feedback modes, using this property is discouraged.
